Make the most of your ultrawide monitor and upgrade it to a home cinema! 

With UltraWide for YouTube, youâ€™ll be able to fit your favorite videos to various ultrawide ratios.
Get rid of the annoying black bars and go fullscreen wider than average!

ğŸ”How to use UltraWide for YouTube?

Follow these simple steps to get the ultrawide fullscreen mode:

1. Add UltraWide for YouTube to Chrome.
2. Go to Extensions (a puzzle piece icon in the browserâ€™s top right corner).
3. Find UltraWide for YouTube and pin it to your toolbar.
4. Click the UltraWide for YouTube icon to open the settings.
5. Set the basic ratio option (Crop or Stretch)
6. Choose one from the defined ratios (21:9, 32:9, or 16:9) or set your custom ratio values.

âœ…Youâ€™re all set! Enjoy fullscreen YouTube videos on your ultrawide monitor.
